attributes.description: The Sandero Stepway adds some spice to life with its assertive front grille, its elevated ground clearance, its roof bars and its exclusive decals. Whether your destination is a getaway break or night out, you’ll find the tone to suit your mood. With all the creature comforts thrown in, this is a genuine luxury city car. All the style of a Sports Utility Vehicle. All the practicality of a family hatchback. Enjoy the best of both worlds with the Sandero Stepway. Its raised ride height gives you a commanding vie of the road ahead. Its black wheel arch extensions side sills and front and rear scuff plates make it every inch a robust Crossover. Yet there’s a suave and sophisticated side to those rugged good looks: 16" ‘Stepway’ design wheels, satin chrome roof bars and a choice of four optional stunning metallic colors give Sandero Stepway an assured presence about town

attributes.description:
With its eye-catching exterior styling, bold headlamps and
muscular stance, the all-new KIA Seltos is a compact SUV like
no other. Not that you would expect anything less from KIA:
with one of the most awarded design teams in the world,
state-of-the-art production technology and world-class
quality credentials, the Seltos is the car you’ve been
waiting for.
Inspired by Greek mythology, the all-new KIA Seltos represents the
brave and assertive spirit of Seltos, son of Hercules. So whether
you’re conquering the urban jungle or exploring the great outdoors,
the all-new KIA Seltos is up for any challenge. And with seven
amazing exterior colours to choose from – including three exciting
two-tone options – your car will match your jovial mood come rain
or shine.

attributes.description:
KIA DEALER OF THE YEAR - 2022
We the Kia Konfidence Edenvale team pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our esteemed clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125-workshop inspection check as well as DEKRA roadworthy and condition report before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles delivered have a full-service history and are accident free. We infuse ourselves with EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. At Kia Edenvale we will also tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your budget as well. We also offer finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal possible. CALL US NOW and one of our experienced Kia Konfidence Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your Vehicle dreams come TRUE.
